attributes.action: Give 12.5 Million Pounds to the Rebuilding of the Castle of Koenigsberg East Prussia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the Undersigned call upon the
 Prime Minister and British Government
 to give 12.5 Million Pounds to the
 Rebuilding of the Castle of Koenigsberg
 in East Prussia as a Gesture of 
 Goodwill and Reconcillation
